00032     Material* Material::mDefaultSettings = 0;

00034     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     Material::Material()
00036     {
00037         static unsigned short num = 1;
00038         char name[14];
00039 
00040 
00041         mDeferLoad = false;
00042         sprintf(name, "Undefined%d", num++);
00043         mName = name;
00044 
00045         mHandle = -1;
00046 
00047         // Default to white ambient & diffuse, no specular / emissive
00048         mAmbient = mDiffuse = ColourValue::White;
00049         mSpecular = mEmissive = ColourValue::Black;
00050         mShininess = 0;
00051 
00052 
00053 
00054         // No textures
00055         mNumTextureLayers = 0;
00056 
00057         // No fog
00058         mFogOverride = false;
00059 
00060         // Default blending (overwrite)
00061         mSourceBlendFactor = SBF_ONE;
00062         mDestBlendFactor = SBF_ZERO;
00063 
00064         mDepthCheck = true;
00065         mDepthWrite = true;
00066         mDepthFunc = CMPF_LESS_EQUAL;
00067         mCullMode = CULL_CLOCKWISE;
00068         mManualCullMode = MANUAL_CULL_BACK;
00069         mLightingEnabled = true;
00070         mShadeOptions = SO_GOURAUD;
00071         mTextureFiltering = TFO_BILINEAR;
00072 
00073 
00074     }
00075     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00076     Material::Material( const String& name, bool deferLoad)
00077     {
00078         applyDefaults();
00079         mDeferLoad = deferLoad;
00080 
00081         // Assign name
00082         mName = name;
00083         mHandle = -1;
00084 
00085 
00086     }
00087     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00088     Material& Material::operator=(const Material& rhs)
00089     {
00090         mName = rhs.mName;
00091         mHandle = rhs.mHandle;
00092 
00093         memcpy( 
00094             &(this->mAmbient), 
00095             &(rhs.mAmbient), 
00096             (uchar*)(&rhs.mNumTextureLayers) - (uchar*)(&rhs.mAmbient) + sizeof( rhs.mNumTextureLayers ) );
00097         /*
00098         mAmbient = rhs.mAmbient;
00099         mDiffuse = rhs.mDiffuse;
00100         mEmissive = rhs.mEmissive;
00101         mShininess = rhs.mShininess;
00102         mSpecular = rhs.mSpecular;
00103         mNumTextureLayers = rhs.mNumTextureLayers;
00104         mSourceBlendFactor = rhs.mSourceBlendFactor;
00105         mDestBlendFactor = rhs.mDestBlendFactor;
00106         */
00107         // Copy texture layers
00108         for (int i = 0; i < mNumTextureLayers; ++i)
00109         {
00110             mTextureLayers[i] = rhs.mTextureLayers[i];
00111         }
00112         /*
00113         mDepthCheck = rhs.mDepthCheck;
00114         mDepthWrite = rhs.mDepthWrite;
00115         mDepthFunc = rhs.mDepthFunc;
00116         mCullMode = rhs.mCullMode;
00117         mLightingEnabled = rhs.mLightingEnabled;
00118         mShadeOptions = rhs.mShadeOptions;
00119         mTextureFiltering = rhs.mTextureFiltering;
00120         mFogOverride = rhs.mFogOverride;
00121         mFogMode = rhs.mFogMode;
00122         mFogColour = rhs.mFogColour;
00123         mFogDensity = rhs.mFogDensity;
00124         mFogStart = rhs.mFogStart;
00125         mFogEnd = rhs.mFogEnd;
00126         mDeferLoad = rhs.mDeferLoad;
00127         */
00128 
00129         return *this;
00130     }

00213     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00214     // Single definition of method to retrieve next handle, to avoid duplication of static member value
00215     void Material::assignNextHandle(void)
00216     {
00217         static int nextHandle = 1;
00218 
00219         mHandle = nextHandle++;
00220     }

00231     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00232     Material::TextureLayer* Material::addTextureLayer(const String& textureName, int texCoordSet)
00233     {
00234         mTextureLayers[mNumTextureLayers].setDeferredLoad(mDeferLoad);
00235         mTextureLayers[mNumTextureLayers].setTextureName(textureName);
00236         mTextureLayers[mNumTextureLayers].setTextureCoordSet(texCoordSet);
00237         return &mTextureLayers[mNumTextureLayers++];
00238     }
00239     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00240     Material::TextureLayer* Material::getTextureLayer(int index) const
00241     {
00242         return const_cast<Material::TextureLayer*>(&mTextureLayers[index]);
00243     }
00244     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00245     void Material::removeTextureLayer()
00246     {
00247         mNumTextureLayers--;
00248     }
00249     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00250     void Material::removeAllTextureLayers(void)
00251     {
00252         mNumTextureLayers = 0;
00253     }
00254     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00255     void Material::setSceneBlending(SceneBlendType sbt)
00256     {
00257         // Turn predefined type into blending factors
00258         switch (sbt)
00259         {
00260         case SBT_TRANSPARENT_ALPHA:
00261             setSceneBlending(SBF_SOURCE_ALPHA, SBF_ONE_MINUS_SOURCE_ALPHA);
00262             break;
00263         case SBT_TRANSPARENT_COLOUR:
00264             setSceneBlending(SBF_SOURCE_COLOUR, SBF_ONE_MINUS_SOURCE_COLOUR);
00265             break;
00266         case SBT_ADD:
00267             setSceneBlending(SBF_ONE, SBF_ONE);
00268             break;
00269         // TODO: more
00270         }
00271 
00272     }
00273     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00274     void Material::setSceneBlending(SceneBlendFactor sourceFactor, SceneBlendFactor destFactor)
00275     {
00276         mSourceBlendFactor = sourceFactor;
00277         mDestBlendFactor = destFactor;
00278 
00279         if ((sourceFactor == SBF_ONE && destFactor == SBF_ZERO) ||
00280             (sourceFactor == SBF_ZERO && destFactor == SBF_ONE))
00281         {
00282             // Solid
00283 
00284         }
00285         else
00286         {
00287             // Transparent
00288             setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
00289         }
00290 
00291     }
00292     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00293     SceneBlendFactor Material::getSourceBlendFactor(void) const
00294     {
00295         return mSourceBlendFactor;
00296     }
00297     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00298     SceneBlendFactor Material::getDestBlendFactor(void) const
00299     {
00300         return mDestBlendFactor;
00301     }
00302     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00303     bool Material::isTransparent(void) const
00304     {
00305         if (mSourceBlendFactor != SBF_ONE || mDestBlendFactor != SBF_ZERO)
00306             return true;
00307         else
00308             return false;
00309     }

00395     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00396     void Material::setFog(bool overrideScene, FogMode mode, const ColourValue& colour, Real density, Real start, Real end)
00397     {
00398         mFogOverride = overrideScene;
00399         if (overrideScene)
00400         {
00401             mFogMode = mode;
00402             mFogColour = colour;
00403             mFogStart = start;
00404             mFogEnd = end;
00405             mFogDensity = density;
00406         }
00407     }

00438     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00439     void Material::load(void)
00440     {
00441         if (!mIsLoaded)
00442         {
00443             if (mDeferLoad)
00444             {
00445                 // Load all textures & controllers
00446                 for (int i = 0; i < mNumTextureLayers; ++i)
00447                 {
00448                     mTextureLayers[i]._load();
00449                 }
00450                 mDeferLoad = false;
00451             }
00452 
00453 
00454             mIsLoaded = true;
00455         }
00456 
00457 
00458     }
00459     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00460     void Material::unload(void)
00461     {
00462     }
00463     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00464     bool Material::_compareSurfaceParams(const Material& cmp) const
00465     {
00466         if (mAmbient != cmp.mAmbient || mDiffuse != cmp.mDiffuse ||
00467         mSpecular != cmp.mSpecular || mEmissive != cmp.mEmissive ||
00468         mShininess != cmp.mShininess)
00469         {
00470             return false;
00471         }
00472         else
00473         {
00474             return true;
00475         }
00476     }
